isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000i, 9000i - INSTALL - INSTALL HOOD

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA), 9900 i (SFA) and 9900 ix (SFA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 12 for all items in parentheses.

If required, assemble tilt assist springs, stop cables, hood shock absorber and splash panels onto the hood before mounting it. If removed install hood mounting insulator (Item 6) and hood hinge pin spacer (Item 7) into each hood hinge (Item 8) and run hex bolt (Item 9) in against hood mounting insulator. Tighten to 60 to 80 In-lbs. (7 to 9 N•m).

step1.para: Place a padded work stand in front of the vehicle. With an assistant, rest the hood assembly (Item 5) in place and install hex bolt hinge pin and flat washer (Item 3 and 4) into each hinge from the outboard side.
Install one flat washer and hex lock nut (Items 1 and 2) on each of the hex bolt hinge pins (Item 3). Tighten to 50 to 55 ft-lbs. (68 to 75 N•m).
Connect the front end wire harness connectors and ground connection between the hood and chassis. Secure the wire harness with the loop clamps on the chassis, if so equipped.

Install hood shock absorber from radiator to hood assembly. Refer to Install Hood Shock Absorber on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA) and 9400 i (SBA)
or refer to Install Hood Shock Absorber on 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood .

Install hood tilt assist spring assembly from radiator to hood assembly. Refer to Install Hood Tilt Assist Spring Assembly on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA), 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood .

Install hood grille onto hood. Refer to Install Hood Grille on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA) and 5500 i (SFA) and 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood
or refer to Install Hood Grille on 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood .

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood on 5500 i (SFA) and 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 13 for all items in parentheses.

If required, assemble tilt assist springs, stop cables and splash panels onto the hood before mounting it. If removed install hood mounting insulator (Item 8) and hood hinge pin spacer (Item 9) into each hood hinge (Item 10) and run hex bolt (Item 11) in against hood mounting insulator. Tighten to 60 to 80 In-lbs. (7 to 9 N•m).

step1.para: Place a padded work stand in front of the vehicle. With an assistant, rest the hood assembly (Item 7) in place and install high crown nut (Item 4), flat washer (Item 5) with hood hinge pin (Item 3) into each hood hinge (Item 10) from the outboard side of each hood hinge bracket (Item 6).
Install one flat washer (Item 2) and high crown nut (Item 1) on the inboard side of each hood hinge bracket (Item 6). Tighten to 50 to 55 ft-lbs. (68 to 75 N•m).
Connect the front end wire harness connector and ground connections between the hood and chassis. Secure the wire harness with the loop clamps on the chassis, if so equipped.
Install hood tilt assist spring assembly from radiator to hood assembly. Refer to Install Hood Tilt Assist Spring Assembly on 5500 i (SFA) and 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood .
Install hood grille onto hood. Refer to Install Hood Grille on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA) and 5500 i (SFA) and 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood .

svcsubproc.title: Install Optional Butterfly Hood on 5600 i (SBA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 15 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: If disassembled, assemble the driver side upper hood panel and driver side hood side panel (Items 14 and 16) together by installing the side hood hinge rod (Item 18), then assemble the passenger side upper hood panel and passenger side hood side panel (Items 15 and 17) together by installing the side hood hinge rod (Item 18).
Assemble the driver side hood assembly (Items 14 and 16) and passenger side hood assembly (Items 15 and 17) together by installing the center hood hinge rod (Item 10).

If removed, position cowl hood hinge weld stud bracket (Item 31) onto center hood support weld stud plate (Item 35) on the cowl and install three hex nuts and lock washers (Items 33 and 34) and tighten. Then install cowl tray (Item 32), refer to Group 16 - CAB in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.

If removed, position left and right lower hood guide plate (Item 26, View in Circle B) onto two mounting studs (Item 30, View in Circle B) and install two hex nuts, lock washers and flat washers (Items 27, 28 and 29, View in Circle B) and tighten.
If removed, position hood hinge cowl bracket (Item 22) onto three mounting studs (Item 25) and install three hex lock nuts and flat washers (Items 23 and 24) and tighten.

If removed, position rear hinge retainer (Item 11) and upper barry mount hood insulator (Item 21) on top of the hood hinge cowl bracket (Item 22). Then position lower barry mount hood insulator (Item 21) under the hood hinge cowl bracket (Item 22) and install two flat head screws (Item 19) through rear hinge retainer, upper barry mount hood insulator, hood hinge cowl bracket and lower barry mount hood insulator and install hex lock nuts (Item 20) and tighten.

With an assistant, position the butterfly hood assembly (Item 13) between the cowl flange and the radiator shell flange. Place cowl hood pivot collar (Item 12) over center hood hinge rod at the cowl end. Insert the center hood hinge pin (Item 10) with cowl hood pivot collar into the rear hinge retainer (Item 11).

Position front hinge retainer (Item 4, View in Circle A) in place on the radiator shell flange (Item 5) and install two flat head screws (Item 2, View in Circle A) through the front hinge retainer, radiator shell flange and hinge rod and hinge support prop bracket assembly (Item 6) and install two hex lock nuts (Item 3, View in Circle A) and tighten.
Raise each side of the hood, as required, to install hood support prop (Item 9) as follows.

Position the top of the hood support prop (Item 9) at the driver side upper hood panel (Item 14) and install shoulder bolt and spring washer (Items 7 and 8) securing it to the driver side upper hood panel and tighten, driver side shown.
Repeat step 10 above to install passenger side hood support prop to passenger side upper hood panel (Item 15).
Close the hood, and fasten the hood latches on both sides.
